body.name: Clothes Steamer Iron, Portable Garment Steamer with Ceramic Coated Panel, Fabric Wrinkle Remover 2 in 1, Fast Heat Up, continuously adjust on Heating & Steaming
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 22 hrs 49 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow 7 AM - 11 AM. Order within 5 hrs 49 mins
features: Ironing and Steaming - 2-in-1 mode for both dry and steam ironing, perfect for freshening up laundry straight from the wash or quickly smoothing out wrinkles of clothes before wearing, without leaving any water marks

Large Soleplate - The large heating panel works with stable steam results in higher ironing efficiency and faster ironing speed. With the same water tank capacity(160ml), our iron can iron more clothes with one fill

Stable Steam Output - With a large heating element of 1200W, our handheld steamer delivers more stable and powerful steam with better penetration than other 1200W garment steamers, which helps achieve a better steaming result

Infinite Control Mode - allows for more precise temperature and steam control, making it suitable for various fabric types. Not only is it beginner-friendly, but also capable of meeting the needs of professional ironers

Our product is backed by a hassle-free warranty and our friendly customer service team is always available to assist with any issues. Please be careful when ironing as the large heating panel may damage clothes if left in one spot for too long, particularly for beginner

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page TEMP Range 203℉-302℉ Ceramic Coated Panel evenly distributed heat output, fast ironing performance without scratching delicate fabrics Infinite steam adjustment More stable and delicate steam More adjustable settings not only for professional ironing also for beginners to operate easily Steam Without Board Steam Clothes Vertically Vertial steaming is very convenient for you to relax fibers quickly and effectively effortless ironing Iron With Steam Ironing made easy, simply glide over the fabric and it becomes smooth Hot Steamer Rest Base Heat-Resistant Base place hot steamer on the heat-resistant base during steaming work when you have other things to do Next page 1 Large Soleplate 2 Powerful Steady Steam 3 Vertically Steaming 4 Horizontally Ironing 5 Heat Resistant-Base

Suitable for a wide range of fabrics Infinite Temperature and Steam Adjustment Capabilities With its infinite adjustment feature, you can achieve precise control over temperature and steam, making it suitable for a variety of fabric types. This user-friendly device caters to both beginners and professional ironers. For beginners, we recommend setting the steamer to the maximum level directly. When using it, please exercise caution and iron swiftly to prevent any potential fabric scorching.

enjoy an effective steaming experience Ironing & Steaming Carefully The large soleplate produces significant heat, which can potentially scorch fabrics if the steamer remains in one spot for an extended period. It is advisable to practice on less important fabrics before using it on your clothes. For inexperienced users, it is recommended to glide the steamer smoothly and quickly across the garments

Suitable for Various Fabrics effortless steaming and ironing allows for more precise temperature and steam control, making it suitable for various fabric types. Not only is it beginner-friendly, but also capable of meeting the needs of professional ironers

Great helper to laundry Suitable for All Kinds of Fabrics Our garment steamer is a versatile and time-saving tool for laundry care. It effectively removes wrinkles, freshens garments, eliminates odors, and provides a hygienic solution. It is a convenient alternative to traditional ironing methods

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and Aesthetically Pleasing Iron!
reviews.reviewText: The YIKA Clothes Steamer Iron is a solid choice for home use. It effectively tackles wrinkles and leaves clothes looking neat. However, it's a bit heavy and bulky for travel use. The straightforward design and efficient steaming make it a reliable option, especially if you're primarily looking for a steamer for home tasks. A practical choice without unnecessary frills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't be scared cause there are no reviews!!!!
reviews.reviewText: This iron is FANTASTIC!! It is light and has a temp control dial which can turn it off. The window is easy to see how much water and boy does it do its job.It is so elegant. I am in love. I have bought 8 irons now and this is the winner. No leaking and easy to use.The plate and construction is quality. I am so happy I took a chance and purchased this. It took a couple minutes to steam out my work shirt. And the iron is just what I needed. I totally recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Steamer and iron in one!
reviews.reviewText: This steamer, iron works great! It is small, compact, comes with a base and funnel that can be used to fill up the steamer. The steamer can be used as a traditional steamer or as an iron. It has a manual control that allows me to control the amount of steam used; from no steam, to a lot of steam. The benefits of having a two in one steamer, iron is that it allows me to create creases in dress pants/shirts. It is compact, which makes it travel friendly. Would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loved the design, but too heavy for a travel iron.
reviews.reviewText: Never actually used it - lovely design, and good size for travel (which was the intended use), but way too heavy to lug around. Returned it and opted for another manufacturer's lighter-weight model.Update: after some conversation with the seller (YIKA Direct), I found them to be very responsive (a speedy refund and even an offer to send me an iron more suitable for my needs). While I am no longer in need of a travel iron, having purchased another one before my trip, I look forward to doing business with VIKA Direct in the future. They seem like an exemplary seller, offering solid products and great customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets very hot
reviews.reviewText: Works amazing, watch out for the heat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does get very hot.and steamy.
reviews.reviewText: It works great. Easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It gets 5 stars because of its cuteness and weight.
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on 7/28/2023. So far, It gets 5 🌟 🌟🌟🌟🌟 because of its cuteness and the weight is nice and heavy. Actually feels like an old time iron. The bottom of the iron has holes for the steam to escape. 14 holes are available to distribute steam. (yep, I counted them 😉) It has a nice yellow color with a beautiful wooden "look" handle. The little Port for it to sit on it nice too. The water cup to fill the iron is small. I haven't used it yet but will let you know if it does work like it should. 💋
